attributes.title: heart been broke so many times iiiii don’t know what to believeeee
attributes.review: i downloaded this app because i found the ad on a cheeto bag and i was surprised mr trump had made more merch. i decided i would give it a try but then i opened the app to the cheeto himself and my led lights turned orange and the potty song started playing on my alexa. -61892991/10 i give for this app. i don’t know if i will ever be able to recover from this disaster. even my pet bird who is gender fluid had passed out from the smell of cheeto. it was absolutely disgusting seeing this expired, moldy, orange, powdered troll with a rag on its head. i’m going to be having nightmares for days. dear mr president: 🧚🏻‍♀️💋✨you dropped this 🔴 put it back on your nose☺️🤡💕✨

attributes.title: president🧚🏼‍♂️💖✨ but make it trashy🥰🦋😻
attributes.review:
I tried to download this app to support our glorious leader donald j trumpet. I could not get past the initial home page. As soon as the app opened my dog caught sight of it and immediately went running. No matter how many times I tried to bribe his ass he refused to come any closer saying that the sight of the “cheeto man” terrified him. He hasn’t slept in days. He will not eat his food. I am worried sick. 

p.s. he also mentioned that if you got a proper toupee and a makeup shade that matches your neck that it might help him stop vomiting 

thank you for traumatizing my pet😔👊🏼
